25
26template <typename T>
27inline T *OffsetDataPointer(uint8_t *data, size_t y, size_t z, size_t rowPitch, size_t depthPitch)
28{
29 return reinterpret_cast<T*>(data + (y * rowPitch) + (z * depthPitch));
30}
31
32template <typename T>
33inline const T *OffsetDataPointer(const uint8_t *data, size_t y, size_t z, size_t rowPitch, size_t depthPitch)
34{
35 return reinterpret_cast<const T*>(data + (y * rowPitch) + (z * depthPitch));
36}
37
38} // namespace priv
39
40void LoadS8D24S8ToD32FX24S8(size_t width,
41 size_t height,
42 size_t depth,
43 const uint8_t *input,
44 size_t inputRowPitch,
45 size_t inputDepthPitch,
46 uint8_t *output,
47 size_t outputRowPitch,
48 size_t outputDepthPitch)
49{
50 for (size_t z = 0; z < depth; z++)
51 {
52 for (size_t y = 0; y < height; y++)
53 {
54 const uint32_t *source =
55 priv::OffsetDataPointer<uint32_t>(input, y, z, inputRowPitch, inputDepthPitch);
56 float *destDepth =
57 priv::OffsetDataPointer<float>(output, y, z, outputRowPitch, outputDepthPitch);
58 uint32_t *destStencil =
59 priv::OffsetDataPointer<uint32_t>(output, y, z, outputRowPitch, outputDepthPitch) +
60 1;
61 for (size_t x = 0; x < width; x++)
62 {
63 destDepth[x * 2] = ((source[x] >> 8) & 0xFFFFFF) / static_cast<float>(0xFFFFFF);
64 destStencil[x * 2] = (source[x] & 0xFF);
65 }
66 }
67 }
68}
69
70static LoadImageFunctionInfo DEPTH24_STENCIL8_to_D32_FLOAT_X24S8_UINT(GLenum type)
71{
72 switch(type)
73 {
74 case GL_UNSIGNED_INT_24_8:
75 return LoadImageFunctionInfo(LoadS8D24S8ToD32FX24S8, true);
76 default:
77 UNREACHABLE();
78 return LoadImageFunctionInfo(nullptr, true);
79 }
80}
81
82
83LoadFunctionMap GetLoadFunctionsMap(GLenum internalFormat, angle::FormatID angleFormat)
84{
85 if(internalFormat == GL_DEPTH24_STENCIL8 && angleFormat == angle::FormatID::D32_FLOAT_S8X24_UINT)
86 {
87 return DEPTH24_STENCIL8_to_D32_FLOAT_X24S8_UINT;
88 }
89 return angle::GetLoadFunctionsMap(internalFormat, angleFormat);
90}
91
92namespace
93{
94
95bool OverrideTextureCaps(const DisplayMtl *display, angle::FormatID formatId, gl::TextureCaps *caps)
96{
97 // NOTE(hqle): Auto generate this.
98 switch (formatId)
99 {
100 // NOTE: even though iOS devices don't support filtering depth textures, we still report as
101 // supported here in order for the OES_depth_texture extension to be enabled.
102 // During draw call, the filter modes will be converted to nearest.
103 case angle::FormatID::D16_UNORM:
104 case angle::FormatID::D24_UNORM_S8_UINT:
105 case angle::FormatID::D32_FLOAT_S8X24_UINT:
106 case angle::FormatID::D32_FLOAT:
107 case angle::FormatID::D32_UNORM:
108 caps->texturable = caps->filterable = caps->textureAttachment = caps->renderbuffer =
109 true;
110 return true;
111 default:
112 // NOTE(hqle): Handle more cases
113 return false;
114 }
115}
116
117void GenerateTextureCapsMap(const FormatTable &formatTable,
118 const DisplayMtl *display,
119 gl::TextureCapsMap *capsMapOut,
120 std::vector<GLenum> *compressedFormatsOut,
121 uint32_t *maxSamplesOut)
122{
123 auto &textureCapsMap = *capsMapOut;
124 auto &compressedFormats = *compressedFormatsOut;
125
126 compressedFormats.clear();
127
128 auto formatVerifier = [&](const gl::InternalFormat &internalFormatInfo) {
129 angle::FormatID angleFormatId =
130 angle::Format::InternalFormatToID(internalFormatInfo.sizedInternalFormat);
131 const Format &mtlFormat = formatTable.getPixelFormat(angleFormatId);
132 if (!mtlFormat.valid())
133 {
134 return;
135 }
136 const FormatCaps &formatCaps = mtlFormat.getCaps();
137
138 const angle::Format &intendedAngleFormat = mtlFormat.intendedAngleFormat();
139 gl::TextureCaps textureCaps;
140
141 // First let check whether we can override certain special cases.
142 if (!OverrideTextureCaps(display, mtlFormat.intendedFormatId, &textureCaps))
143 {
144 // Fill the texture caps using pixel format's caps
145 textureCaps.filterable = mtlFormat.getCaps().filterable;
146 textureCaps.renderbuffer =
147 mtlFormat.getCaps().colorRenderable || mtlFormat.getCaps().depthRenderable;
148 textureCaps.texturable = true;
149 textureCaps.textureAttachment = textureCaps.renderbuffer;
150 textureCaps.blendable = mtlFormat.getCaps().blendable;
151 }
152
153 if (formatCaps.multisample)
154 {
155 constexpr uint32_t sampleCounts[] = {2, 4, 8};
156 for (auto sampleCount : sampleCounts)
157 {
158 if ([display->getMetalDevice() supportsTextureSampleCount:sampleCount])
159 {
160 textureCaps.sampleCounts.insert(sampleCount);
161 *maxSamplesOut = std::max(*maxSamplesOut, sampleCount);
162 }
163 }
164 }
165
166 textureCapsMap.set(mtlFormat.intendedFormatId, textureCaps);
167
168 if (intendedAngleFormat.isBlock)
169 {
170 compressedFormats.push_back(intendedAngleFormat.glInternalFormat);
171 }
172 };
173
174 // Texture caps map.
175 const gl::FormatSet &internalFormats = gl::GetAllSizedInternalFormats();
176 for (const auto internalFormat : internalFormats)
177 {
178 const gl::InternalFormat &internalFormatInfo =
179 gl::GetSizedInternalFormatInfo(internalFormat);
180
181 formatVerifier(internalFormatInfo);
182 }
183}
184
185} // namespace
186
187// FormatBase implementation
188const angle::Format &FormatBase::actualAngleFormat() const
189{
190 return angle::Format::Get(actualFormatId);
191}
192
193const angle::Format &FormatBase::intendedAngleFormat() const
194{
195 return angle::Format::Get(intendedFormatId);
196}
197
198// Format implementation
199const gl::InternalFormat &Format::intendedInternalFormat() const
200{
201 return gl::GetSizedInternalFormatInfo(intendedAngleFormat().glInternalFormat);
202}
203
204const gl::InternalFormat &Format::actualInternalFormat() const
205{
206 return gl::GetSizedInternalFormatInfo(actualAngleFormat().glInternalFormat);
207}
208
209bool Format::needConversion(angle::FormatID srcFormatId) const
210{
211 if ((srcFormatId == angle::FormatID::BC1_RGB_UNORM_BLOCK &&
212 actualFormatId == angle::FormatID::BC1_RGBA_UNORM_BLOCK) ||
213 (srcFormatId == angle::FormatID::BC1_RGB_UNORM_SRGB_BLOCK &&
214 actualFormatId == angle::FormatID::BC1_RGBA_UNORM_SRGB_BLOCK))
215 {
216 // When texture swizzling is available, DXT1 RGB format will be swizzled with RGB1.
217 // WebGL allows unswizzled mapping when swizzling is not available. No need to convert.
218 return false;
219 }
220 return srcFormatId != actualFormatId;
221}
222
223bool Format::isPVRTC() const
224{
225 switch (metalFormat)
226 {
227#if TARGET_OS_IOS && !TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
228 case MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGB_2BPP:
229 case MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGB_2BPP_sRGB:
230 case MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGB_4BPP:
231 case MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGB_4BPP_sRGB:
232 case MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGBA_2BPP:
233 case MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGBA_2BPP_sRGB:
234 case MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGBA_4BPP:
235 case MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGBA_4BPP_sRGB:
236 return true;
237#endif
238 default:
239 return false;
240 }
241}
242
243// FormatTable implementation
244angle::Result FormatTable::initialize(const DisplayMtl *display)
245{
246 mMaxSamples = 0;
247
248 // Initialize native format caps
249 initNativeFormatCaps(display);
250
251 for (size_t i = 0; i < angle::kNumANGLEFormats; ++i)
252 {
253 const auto formatId = static_cast<angle::FormatID>(i);
254
255 mPixelFormatTable[i].init(display, formatId);
256 mPixelFormatTable[i].caps = &mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[mPixelFormatTable[i].metalFormat];
257
258 if (mPixelFormatTable[i].actualFormatId != mPixelFormatTable[i].intendedFormatId)
259 {
260 mPixelFormatTable[i].textureLoadFunctions = mtl::GetLoadFunctionsMap(
261 mPixelFormatTable[i].intendedAngleFormat().glInternalFormat,
262 mPixelFormatTable[i].actualFormatId);
263 }
264
265 mVertexFormatTables[0][i].init(formatId, false);
266 mVertexFormatTables[1][i].init(formatId, true);
267 }
268
269 // NOTE(hqle): Work-around AMD's issue that D24S8 format sometimes returns zero during sampling:
270 if (display->getRendererDescription().find("AMD") != std::string::npos)
271 {
272 const auto& d32format = mPixelFormatTable[static_cast<uint32_t>(angle::FormatID::D32_FLOAT_S8X24_UINT)];
273
274 // Fallback to D32_FLOAT_S8X24_UINT.
275 Format &format =
276 mPixelFormatTable[static_cast<uint32_t>(angle::FormatID::D24_UNORM_S8_UINT)];
277 format.actualFormatId = angle::FormatID::D32_FLOAT_S8X24_UINT;
278 format.metalFormat = MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float_Stencil8;
279 format.initFunction = d32format.initFunction;
280 format.textureLoadFunctions = d32format.textureLoadFunctions;
281 format.caps = &mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float_Stencil8];
282 }
283
284 return angle::Result::Continue;
285}
286
287void FormatTable::generateTextureCaps(const DisplayMtl *display,
288 gl::TextureCapsMap *capsMapOut,
289 std::vector<GLenum> *compressedFormatsOut)
290{
291 GenerateTextureCapsMap(*this, display, capsMapOut, compressedFormatsOut, &mMaxSamples);
292}
293
294const Format &FormatTable::getPixelFormat(angle::FormatID angleFormatId) const
295{
296 return mPixelFormatTable[static_cast<size_t>(angleFormatId)];
297}
298const FormatCaps &FormatTable::getNativeFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormat mtlFormat) const
299{
300 ASSERT(mNativePixelFormatCapsTable.count(mtlFormat));
301 return mNativePixelFormatCapsTable.at(mtlFormat);
302}
303const VertexFormat &FormatTable::getVertexFormat(angle::FormatID angleFormatId,
304 bool tightlyPacked) const
305{
306 auto tableIdx = tightlyPacked ? 1 : 0;
307 return mVertexFormatTables[tableIdx][static_cast<size_t>(angleFormatId)];
308}
309
310void FormatTable::setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormat formatId,
311 bool filterable,
312 bool writable,
313 bool blendable,
314 bool multisample,
315 bool resolve,
316 bool colorRenderable)
317{
318 setFormatCaps(formatId, filterable, writable, blendable, multisample, resolve, colorRenderable,
319 false, 0);
320}
321void FormatTable::setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormat formatId,
322 bool filterable,
323 bool writable,
324 bool blendable,
325 bool multisample,
326 bool resolve,
327 bool colorRenderable,
328 NSUInteger pixelBytes,
329 NSUInteger channels)
330{
331 setFormatCaps(formatId, filterable, writable, blendable, multisample, resolve, colorRenderable,
332 false, pixelBytes, channels);
333}
334
335void FormatTable::setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormat formatId,
336 bool filterable,
337 bool writable,
338 bool blendable,
339 bool multisample,
340 bool resolve,
341 bool colorRenderable,
342 bool depthRenderable)
343{
344 setFormatCaps(formatId, filterable, writable, blendable, multisample, resolve, colorRenderable,
345 depthRenderable, 0, 0);
346}
347void FormatTable::setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormat id,
348 bool filterable,
349 bool writable,
350 bool blendable,
351 bool multisample,
352 bool resolve,
353 bool colorRenderable,
354 bool depthRenderable,
355 NSUInteger pixelBytes,
356 NSUInteger channels)
357{
358 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].filterable = filterable;
359 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].writable = writable;
360 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].colorRenderable = colorRenderable;
361 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].depthRenderable = depthRenderable;
362 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].blendable = blendable;
363 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].multisample = multisample;
364 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].resolve = resolve;
365 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].pixelBytes = pixelBytes;
366 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].pixelBytesMSAA = pixelBytes;
367 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].channels = channels;
368 if (channels != 0)
369 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].alignment = MAX(pixelBytes / channels, 1U);
370}
371
372void FormatTable::setCompressedFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormat formatId, bool filterable)
373{
374 setFormatCaps(formatId, filterable, false, false, false, false, false, false);
375}
376
377void FormatTable::adjustFormatCapsForDevice(id<MTLDevice> device,
378 MTLPixelFormat id,
379 bool supportsiOS2,
380 bool supportsiOS4)
381{
382#if !(TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST)
383
384 NSUInteger pixelBytesRender = mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].pixelBytes;
385 NSUInteger pixelBytesRenderMSAA = mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].pixelBytesMSAA;
386 NSUInteger alignment = mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].alignment;
387
388// Override the current pixelBytesRender
389# define SPECIFIC(_pixelFormat, _pixelBytesRender) \
390 case _pixelFormat: \
391 pixelBytesRender = _pixelBytesRender; \
392 pixelBytesRenderMSAA = _pixelBytesRender; \
393 alignment = \
394 supportsiOS4 ? _pixelBytesRender / mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].channels : 4; \
395 break
396// Override the current pixel bytes render, and MSAA
397# define SPECIFIC_MSAA(_pixelFormat, _pixelBytesRender, _pixelBytesRenderMSAA) \
398 case _pixelFormat: \
399 pixelBytesRender = _pixelBytesRender; \
400 pixelBytesRenderMSAA = _pixelBytesRenderMSAA; \
401 alignment = \
402 supportsiOS4 ? _pixelBytesRender / mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].channels : 4; \
403 break
404// Override the current pixelBytesRender, and alignment
405# define SPECIFIC_ALIGN(_pixelFormat, _pixelBytesRender, _alignment) \
406 case _pixelFormat: \
407 pixelBytesRender = _pixelBytesRender; \
408 pixelBytesRenderMSAA = _pixelBytesRender; \
409 alignment = _alignment; \
410 break
411
412 if (!mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].compressed)
413 {
414 // On AppleGPUFamily4+, there is no 4byte minimum requirement for render targets
415 uint32_t minSize = supportsiOS4 ? 1U : 4U;
416 pixelBytesRender = MAX(mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].pixelBytes, minSize);
417 pixelBytesRenderMSAA = pixelBytesRender;
418 alignment =
419 supportsiOS4 ? MAX(pixelBytesRender / mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].channels, 1U) : 4;
420 }
421
422 // This list of tables starts from a general multi-platform table,
423 // to specific platforms (i.e. ios2, ios4) inheriting from the previous tables
424
425 // Start off with the general case
426 switch ((NSUInteger)id)
427 {
428 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatB5G6R5Unorm, 4U);
429 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatA1BGR5Unorm, 4U);
430 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatABGR4Unorm, 4U);
431 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatBGR5A1Unorm, 4U);
432
433 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm, 4U);
434 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm, 4U);
435
436 SPECIFIC_MSAA(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm_sRGB, 4U, 8U);
437 SPECIFIC_MSAA(MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm_sRGB, 4U, 8U);
438 SPECIFIC_MSAA(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Snorm, 4U, 8U);
439 SPECIFIC_MSAA(MTLPixelFormatRGB10A2Uint, 4U, 8U);
440
441 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatRGB10A2Unorm, 8U);
442 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatBGR10A2Unorm, 8U);
443
444 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatRG11B10Float, 8U);
445
446 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatRGB9E5Float, 8U);
447
448 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatStencil8, 1U);
449 }
450
451 // Override based ios2
452 if (supportsiOS2)
453 {
454 switch ((NSUInteger)id)
455 {
456 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatB5G6R5Unorm, 8U);
457 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatA1BGR5Unorm, 8U);
458 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatABGR4Unorm, 8U);
459 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatBGR5A1Unorm, 8U);
460 SPECIFIC_MSAA(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm, 4U, 8U);
461 SPECIFIC_MSAA(MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm, 4U, 8U);
462 }
463 }
464
465 // Override based on ios4
466 if (supportsiOS4)
467 {
468 switch ((NSUInteger)id)
469 {
470 SPECIFIC_ALIGN(MTLPixelFormatB5G6R5Unorm, 6U, 2U);
471 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm, 4U);
472 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm, 4U);
473
474 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm_sRGB, 4U);
475 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm_sRGB, 4U);
476
477 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Snorm, 4U);
478
479 SPECIFIC_ALIGN(MTLPixelFormatRGB10A2Unorm, 4U, 4U);
480 SPECIFIC_ALIGN(MTLPixelFormatBGR10A2Unorm, 4U, 4U);
481 SPECIFIC(MTLPixelFormatRGB10A2Uint, 8U);
482
483 SPECIFIC_ALIGN(MTLPixelFormatRG11B10Float, 4U, 4U);
484
485 SPECIFIC_ALIGN(MTLPixelFormatRGB9E5Float, 4U, 4U);
486 }
487 }
488 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].pixelBytes = pixelBytesRender;
489 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].pixelBytesMSAA = pixelBytesRenderMSAA;
490 mNativePixelFormatCapsTable[id].alignment = alignment;
491
492# undef SPECIFIC
493# undef SPECIFIC_ALIGN
494# undef SPECIFIC_MSAA
495#endif
496 // macOS does not need to perform any additoinal adjustment. These values are only used to check
497 // valid MRT sizes on iOS.
498}
499
500void FormatTable::initNativeFormatCaps(const DisplayMtl *display)
501{
502 const angle::FeaturesMtl &featuresMtl = display->getFeatures();
503 // Skip auto resolve if either hasDepth/StencilAutoResolve or allowMultisampleStoreAndResolve
504 // feature are disabled.
505 bool supportDepthAutoResolve = featuresMtl.hasDepthAutoResolve.enabled &&
506 featuresMtl.allowMultisampleStoreAndResolve.enabled;
507 bool supportStencilAutoResolve = featuresMtl.hasStencilAutoResolve.enabled &&
508 featuresMtl.allowMultisampleStoreAndResolve.enabled;
509 bool supportDepthStencilAutoResolve = supportDepthAutoResolve && supportStencilAutoResolve;
510
511 // Source: https://developer.apple.com/metal/Metal-Feature-Set-Tables.pdf
512 // clang-format off
513
514 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable | bytesPerChannel | channel
515 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatA8Unorm, true, false, false, false, false, false, 1U, 1U);
516 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR8Unorm, true, true, true, true, true, true, 1U, 1U);
517 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR8Snorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(2, 1), true, 1U, 1U);
518 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR16Unorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1, 1), true, 2U, 1U);
519 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR16Snorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1, 1), true, 2U, 1U);
520 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG8Unorm, true, true, true, true, true, true, 1U, 1U);
521 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG8Snorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(2, 1), true, 2U, 2U);
522 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG16Unorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1, 1), true, 4U, 2U);
523 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG16Snorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1, 1), true, 4U, 2U);
524 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA16Unorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1, 1), true, 8U, 4U);
525 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA16Snorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1, 1), true, 8U, 4U);
526 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA16Float, true, true, true, true, true, true, 8U, 4U);
527
528 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable |
529 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm, true, true, true, true, true, true, 4U, 4U);
530 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm_sRGB, true, display->supportsIOSGPUFamily(2), true, true, true, true, 4U, 4U);
531 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Snorm, true, true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(2, 1), true, 4U, 4U);
532 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm, true, true, true, true, true, true, 4U, 4U);
533 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm_sRGB, true, display->supportsIOSGPUFamily(2), true, true, true, true, 4U, 4U);
534
535 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable |
536 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR16Float, true, true, true, true, true, true, 2U, 1U);
537 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG16Float, true, true, true, true, true, true, 4U, 2U);
538 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR32Float, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), true, true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), true, 4U, 1U);
539
540#if TARGET_OS_IOS && !TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
541 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable |
542 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatB5G6R5Unorm, true, false, true, true, true, true, 2U, 3U);
543 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatABGR4Unorm, true, false, true, true, true, true, 2U, 4U);
544 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatBGR5A1Unorm, true, false, true, true, true, true, 2U, 4U);
545 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatA1BGR5Unorm, true, false, true, true, true, true, 2U, 4U);
546#endif
547
548 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable |
549 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatBGR10A2Unorm, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(3, 1), true, true, true, true, 4U, 4U);
550 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGB10A2Unorm, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(3, 1), true, true, true, true, 4U, 4U);
551 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGB10A2Uint, false, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(3, 1), false, true, false, true, 4U, 4U);
552 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG11B10Float, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(3, 1), true, true, true, true, 4U, 3U);
553
554 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable |
555 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGB9E5Float, true, display->supportsIOSGPUFamily(3), display->supportsIOSGPUFamily(1), display->supportsIOSGPUFamily(1), display->supportsIOSGPUFamily(1), display->supportsIOSGPUFamily(1), 4U, 3U);
556
557 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable |
558 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR8Uint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 1U, 1U);
559 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR8Sint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 1U, 1U);
560 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR16Uint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 2U, 1U);
561 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR16Sint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 4U, 1U);
562 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG8Uint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 2U, 2U);
563 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG8Sint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 2U, 2U);
564 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR32Uint, false, true, false, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, true, 4U, 1U);
565 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatR32Sint, false, true, false, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, true, 4U, 1U);
566 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG16Uint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 4U, 2U);
567 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG16Sint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 4U, 2U);
568 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Uint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 4U, 1U);
569 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Sint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 4U, 1U);
570 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG32Uint, false, true, false, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, true, 8U, 2U);
571 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG32Sint, false, true, false, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, true, 8U, 2U);
572 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA16Uint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 8U, 4U);
573 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA16Sint, false, true, false, true, false, true, 8U, 4U);
574 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA32Uint, false, true, false, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, true, 16U, 4U);
575 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA32Sint, false, true, false, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, true, 16U, 4U);
576
577 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable |
578 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRG32Float, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), true, true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), true, 8U, 2U);
579 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatRGBA32Float, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), true, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), true, 16U, 4U);
580
581 // | formatId | filterable | writable | blendable | multisample | resolve | colorRenderable | depthRenderable |
582 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, false, true, supportDepthAutoResolve, false, true, 4U, 1U);
583 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatStencil8, false, false, false, true, false, false, true, 1U, 1U);
584 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float_Stencil8, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, false, true, supportDepthStencilAutoResolve, false, true, 8U, 2U);
585//ToDo: @available on 13.0
586 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatDepth16Unorm, true, false, false, true, supportDepthAutoResolve, false, true, 2U, 1U);
587#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
588 setFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormatDepth24Unorm_Stencil8, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), false, false, true, supportDepthStencilAutoResolve, false, display->supportsEitherGPUFamily(1,1), 4U, 2U);
